original_title: Céline Dion Live At Tokyo Dome
overview: Celine Dion Live 2018 was a concert tour by Canadian singer Celine Dion to support her greatest hits album, The Best So Far... 2018 Tour Edition (2018). It marked Dion's first concerts in Asia and Australia since the Taking Chances World Tour in 2008. The tour began on 26 June 2018 in Tokyo, Japan and concluded on 14 August 2018 in Auckland, New Zealand, making a total of 22 concerts performed. The tour was sold-out and grossed $56.5 million. The first concert of the tour which took place in Tokyo was recorded and broadcast on 25 August 2018. This show sold record number of 42,748 tickets.
title: Céline Dion Live At Tokyo Dome 2018
